cab.content: (This Document is the Property of Jlli Br'*annfc Majesty^ Government.)SECRETOPERATIONS.Priority. From:- General Plumer, Italy,To:- C.I.G.S, War Offloe. Handed in at 10t40cp,m,21,11.17. Received at 2.25,a.m*22,11.17,0.35 Novr, 21st,Situation practically unchanged,There is some additional concentration of the enemy reported about Monte Grappaj otherwise nothing but outpost affairs and a certain amount of artillery activity reported. I have seen Diaz this evening and he is satisfied with the situation, I have discussed future movements with Foch and Fayolle to-day and we shall probably settle arrangements with Diaz tomorrow.Our troops have been very vie 11 received everywhere0
